name: Document Type
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a clinical document type. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Document Type' subset with subset original id 1061000000133; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Document type simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000741000000100.
